info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 5 at 12:44PM PDT until September 5 at 2:45PM PDT by NWS Elko NV
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Portions of central and north central Nevada, including the following counties, in central Nevada, Nye. In north central Nevada, Lander.
* WHEN...Until 245 PM PDT this afternoon.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1244 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.8 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.8 to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of South Central Lander and Nye Counties - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Flooding is occurring or is imminent. It is important to know where you are relative to streams, rivers, or creeks which can become killers in heavy rains. Campers and hikers should avoid streams or creeks.

parameter.value: A FLOOD ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON
